urls.title: BEREC Office
urls.description: After a couple of workshops and a public consultation round, BEREC has adopted and published its final Report on the ex-ante regulation of digital gatekeepers. During their engagement, stakeholders broadly supported most of the BEREC views and recognised the relevance and legitimacy of BEREC taking a stance on the ex-ante regulation of digital gatekeepers. Thanks to feedback from the industry and other stakeholders ‚Äì including civil society representatives ‚Äì BEREC improved its draft document. BEREC now

@BERECeuropaeu #BERECworkshop: The question is not just how the user can check if they get the quality they pay for, but how regulators can assess whether and how much the IAS quality of the non-paying users is deteriorating in a QoS driven network and inter-connection market?

@BERECeuropaeu No empirical evidence that heavy handed EU rules work. FCC repealed rules in 2017 and there have never been more internet startups in US than now. 34,000 last year alone. No new internet innovation in EU from its rules. Soft law approach best. See research https://t.co/kjpbEYEtNV
